alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 13 at 6:05PM MST until July 13 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 730 PM MST. * At 605 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Queen Valley to near Magma to near Olberg to near Freeman, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 160 and 193. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 117 and 160. US Highway 60 between mile markers 181 and 218. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Casa Grande, Apache Junction, Florence, Coolidge, Gila Bend, Gold Canyon, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Estrella and Gold Camp. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be unhealthy and has been known to lead to Valley Fever. Avoid outdoor exposure. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
